body.name: PERBOL Sonic Electric Toothbrush for Adults, Rechargeable with 6 Replacement Brush Heads, 5 Modes and 3 Intensity, with 2-Minute Intelligent Timer and IPX7 Waterproof Technology, in Antique Black

features: 【5 Brushing Modes And 3 Intensities】 Provide 5 personalized modes: Clean, White, Polish, Gum Care, and Sensitive functions; Suitable for different oral conditions. Built in with 3 intensities, find the most suitable cleaning intensity for you. 15 personalized cleaning options to help you have a fresh, clean taste and healthier gums.

【Portable Travel Electric Toothbrush】 The brush head adopts high-quality DuPont bristles from the United States and Pedex discolored bristles from Germany, with a wavy curved surface. Equipped with 4 U-shaped and 2 W-shaped replaceable brush heads, it can be used for 18 months. IPX7 waterproof technology, rechargeable sonic electric toothbrush with intelligent electricity prompt, ultra long endurance to meet the needs of travel.

【Intelligent Timer】 Built in 2-minute intelligent timer, automatically shuts down after 2 minutes; 30 second intelligent reminder, memory function; Pause every 30 seconds to remind you to change the brushing area. Let you brush your teeth at the best time recommended by the dentist to maintain healthy teeth and develop good brushing habits.

【Customer Service】 We are committed to providing customers with high-quality products and services. If you have any questions during use, please feel free to contact us and we will provide you with satisfactory customer service.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The toothbrush works great and has great features. I am very pleased with it. I would recommend it to anyone wanting a reasonably priced electric toothbrush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value for a quality product
reviews.reviewText: This sonic toothbrush was a hit! I said goodbye to the old rotating bristles and traded it in for this amazing technology. I also previously owned a Sonic care product. I decided to replace it and to buy this instead to try it out. It was definitely a great find! Not only was it a great value, but the product is solid. This toothbrush cleans your teeth and stimulates your gums to at the same time. You can choose the level of intensity, which helps when you have sensitive teeth. In addition, it has a timer to help remind you to keep brushing and the battery keeps its charge forever it seems- a couple months or more. I also love that it has so many extra toothbrush heads. The name brand products give you one or two and the refills are expensive.I like this toothbrush so much I bought two more for my older kids. It is a must-have item if you value your dental health!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Electric tooth brush
reviews.reviewText: The tooth brush with 6 extra head is wonderful and easy to use and very much effective

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars great for traveling
reviews.reviewText: This toothbrush is a great addition to my oral hygiene. It works great and I've had it for a month and had no issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great first electric toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a gift for my college nephews. They wanted to try an electric toothbrush for the first time. I went with this one because it had great reviews and extra brush heads, unlike the other top brand name companies. So far they love it. It holds a very long charge, easy for they to store and travel with and the extra brush heads mens they don't have to spend more money to replace them in a long while.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing for price
reviews.reviewText: My dentist suggested I try an electric toothbrush. I was very hesitant at first and also didn’t want to spend $100 on one. So thankful I found these for my and my husband. They have different speeds and leave my teeth feeling amazing. I don’t spend tons of time like I did with a manual brush. The product isn’t heavy. I also loved that it came with replacement heads that will last a while before reordering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Brush Heads don’t last
reviews.reviewText: The included brush heads don’t last! I bought this for my daughter who has braces on Sept. 12, 2023 and after 2 weeks, the green brush head was already worn out. Same with the rest. She’s on her last 2 head brush now. Description says the included 6 brushes will last 18months. Now I’m looking to buy more replacement brush heads but I couldn’t find anything that fits the brush! It’s different from the standard sonicare brushes, I know because I have 2 more sonicare brushes and none of its brushes fit when I tried to put one on this brush.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This was such a grest deal! It came with multiple replacement brushes and a charger. I've had it for over a month and haven't needed to charge it yet. There are several settings. 10/10 recommended!
